title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Pediatric Emergency Medicine Simulation-Based Skill Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Understanding of Fundamental First Aid Concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Accurately perform five core pediatric emergency skills (e.g., intubation, IV access) in simulation environments
Improve clinical judgment and confidence by ≥30% during emergency procedures through simulation training
Learners can meet at least eight out of ten checklist items within one week and submit an improvement plan reflecting at least three types of expert feedback from a video review.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
